verbs.description: italy [V: struggling] [ARG1: economy] has world healthiest people when it comes to living a long life italy is the place to be the high - heeled boot surrounded by five seas is ranked the healthiest country on earth in the bloomberg global health index of 163 countries a baby born in italy can expect to live to be an octogenarian but 2 800 miles south in sierra leone the average newborn will die by 52 while italy is among the most developed countries growth has stagnated for decades almost 40 percent of its youngsters are out of jobs and it saddled with centers for disease control and prevention blood pressure singapore iceland center for public health nutrition adam drewnowski tom kenyon switzerland struggling economy sierra leone
